yoshida.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • yoshida.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a Rectangle
    Version:
    9/22/15
    Author:
    Ryan Yoshida

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates new Rectangle with all fields set to zero.

      Creates new Rectangle with location, width, and height set
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, java.awt.Color fill, java.awt.Color stroke, double strokeWeight)
      Creates new Rectangle with location, width, and height set

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates new Rectangle with all fields set to zero. Fill and stroke is set to black and strokeWeight is set to 1
        Postcondition:
        all fields set to zero

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates new Rectangle with location, width, and height set
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the Rectangle
        y - y-coordinate of the Rectangle
        width - width of the Rectangle
        height - height of the Rectangle
        Postcondition:
        location is set to rectangles top left corner

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 java.awt.Color fill,
                 java.awt.Color stroke,
                 double strokeWeight)
        Creates new Rectangle with location, width, and height set
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the Rectangle
        y - y-coordinate of the Rectangle
        width - width of the Rectangle
        height - height of the Rectangle
        fill - the fill color of the rectangle
        stroke - the stroke color of the rectangle
        strokeWeight - thickness of the stroke
        Postcondition:
        location is set to rectangles top left corner

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Returns a double of the perimeter of the rectangle
        Returns:
        double perimeter of the rectangle

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns a double of the area of the rectangle
        Returns:
        double area

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Returns true if the point given in the parameter is inside the rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - the x-value of the point to check
        y - the y-value of the point to check
        Returns:
        boolean if the (x,y) point is inside the rectangle

      • findLines

        public Line[] findLines()
        Finds the 4 lines that make up a rectangle
        Returns:
        Line[] returns the lines that make up the rectangle
        Postcondition:
        always returns array of four lines

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rectangle other)
        Uses the lines and the lines' intersect methods to check for overlapping rectangles and returns a boolean based on that information
        Parameters:
        other - Another rectangle to check against
        Returns:
        boolean whether the rectangles overlap

      • move

        public void move(float x,
                 float y)
        Takes in two parameters and increases the x and y values based on these parameters
        Parameters:
        x - float value of amount to move the rectangle along the x-axis
        y - float value of amount to move the rectangle along the y-axis
        Postcondition:
        the coordinates of the rectangle are moved

      • getCenter

        public java.awt.Point getCenter()
        Finds the point that is the center of the rectangle
        Returns:
        Point the center of the rectangle

      • changeFillColor

        public void changeFillColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Changes the fill color of the Rectangle
        Parameters:
        c - the color to change the rectangle to

      • changeStrokeColor

        public void changeStrokeColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Changes the stroke color of the Rectangle
        Parameters:
        c - the color to change the stroke of the rectangle to

      • changStrokeWeight

        public void changStrokeWeight(float d)
        Changes the strokeWeight of the stroke of the Rectangle
        Parameters:
        d - the new strokeWeight of the stroke
        Precondition:
        d must be greater than or equal to 0

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the rectangle based on the lines it is made of. This rectangle will have top left coordinates x,y and the specified width and height
        Parameters:
        marker - - from the PApplet class used to draw on
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null
        Postcondition:
        textAlign is set to CENTER, textAlign is set to CENTER, fill is set to noFill, stroke is set to noStroke, strokeWeight is set to 0
